name: Friday Night Fever (DriftingDuck)
description:
God had to create disco music so I could be born and be successful.

– Donna Summer

GAMEPLAY
  • The board rotates each turn in a direction. 
  • Plan your way and let the disco ball roll.
  • Try to reach your power glasses.
  • Features 3 difficulty levels!
  • Use keys 1 - 4, 1 - 9 or A - Z to free your way.
  • Be patient and plan your next turn wisely!
CREDITS

Contribution to TriJam 193  "Patience!"

Bugs
  • Sometimes the play starts with a stairway-like layout of the board. Just restart the game.
